relation: How does this Board work? -getting started, why we are here, rules and policies
Questions and Suggestions -general questions and board suggestions... for specific advice on how to bid/buy in a given area, post at the appropriate State forum (scroll down)
Read this BEFORE you post -new to the board, please read to make worthwhile for everyone

Off Topic: Run of House -hotels use the term 'run of house' for rooms that aren't assigned until check-in, so it seemed appropriate as this forum will be for anything that doesn't fit into another category, unrelated travel talk, or anything else that is on your mind
Help Support BetterBidding -sponsor links to use for travel and everyday purchases which will help support BetterBidding
